title: How to Make an Anti Static Remedy for Synthetics

steps.headline: Mix the fabric softener and water together.
Pour into a spray bottle (use a funnel if needed).
steps.description: Be sure to label the bottle so that you remember what it is.

steps.headline: Spray on synthetics as you iron them.

text: Mix the fabric softener and water together.  Pour into a spray bottle (use a funnel if needed). Be sure to label the bottle so that you remember what it is. Spray on synthetics as you iron them.
